Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the physicalResourceId, which is âUserPoolUICustomizationAttachment-UserPoolId-ClientId". For example:

For the Amazon Cognito user pool domain UserPoolUICustomizationAttachment-us-east-1_FAKEPOOLID-2asc123fakeclientidajjulj6bh, Ref returns the name of the UI customization attachment.
